y40Event.summary: Experience Aqua Dance Flow in the world's deepest pool with Julie Gautier

hero.banner: Julie Gautier will be present at the Paris's Diving Exhibition, January 9-12, 2025.
hero.text: Run, jump, fly, dance underwater. A new way to practice freediving.
